text: (yud'dhattinupeakate) ninnal kaikal atakkivekkukayum, prart'thana murapeale nirvahikkukayum. sakatt nalkukayum ceyyuvin enn nirdesikkappettirunna oru kuttare ni kantille? pinnitavarkk yud'dham nirbandhamayi niscayikkappettappeal avaril oru vibhagamata allahuve bhayappetum pealeyea, atinekkal saktamaya nilayilea janannale bhayappetunnu. nannalute raksitave, niyentinan nannalkk yud'dham nirbandhamakkiyat‌? atutta oru avadhivareyenkilum nannalkk samayam nittittannukutayirunnea? ennan avar parannat‌. parayuka: ihaleakatte sukhanubhavam valare tucchamayatan‌. paraleakaman suksmata palikkunnavarkk kututal gunakaram. ninnaleat oru tarimpum aniti kanikkappetukayumilla
